member.name: T:SeeSharp.BitmapEffect
member.summary: Represents an abstract bitmap effect

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffect.Apply(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Applies the current effect to the given bitmap and returns the result

member.name: T:SeeSharp.IColorEffect
member.summary: Represents an abstract bitmap effect wich applies a stored color matrix to each of the bitmap's pixel

member.name: P:SeeSharp.IColorEffect.ColorMatrix
member.summary: Color matrix to be applied to the bitmap

member.name: T:SeeSharp.ITransformEffect
member.summary: Represents an abstract bitmap effect wich applies a stored transformation matrix to each of the bitmap's pixel

member.name: P:SeeSharp.ITransformEffect.TransformMatrix
member.summary: Transformation matrix to be applied to the bitmap

member.name: T:SeeSharp.RangeEffect
member.summary: Represents an abstract bitmap effect which applies the underlying algorithm only to a specific rage of the bitmap

member.name: P:SeeSharp.RangeEffect.Range
member.summary: The range, to which the effect should be applied (a null-value applies the effect to the entire image)

member.name: T:SeeSharp.InstagramEffect
member.summary: Represents an Instagram-photo effect, which has been ported from the instagramm service's CSS code

member.name: T:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions
member.summary: Contains all basic functions needed to apply effects to bitmaps

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.ApplyEffectRange``1(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Rectangle})
member.summary: Applies the given bitmap effect to a given range/section of the given bitmap
member.param: Bitmap, to which the effect shall be (partially) applied
Region, in which the effect shall be applied (a null-value applies the effect to the entire bitmap)

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.ApplyEffectRange``1(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Rectangle},System.Object[])
member.summary: Applies the given parameterized bitmap effect to a given range/section of the given bitmap
member.param: Bitmap, to which the effect shall be (partially) applied
Region, in which the effect shall be applied (a null-value applies the effect to the entire bitmap)

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.PartialApplyEffectRange(System.Drawing.Bitmap,SeeSharp.BitmapEffect,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Rectangle},System.Double)
member.summary: Applies the given bitmap effect to a given range/section of the given bitmap to a certain amount and interpolates the result with the input bitmap
member.param: Bitmap, to which the effect shall be (partially) applied
Region, in which the effect shall be applied (a null-value applies the effect to the entire bitmap)
Amount to which the effect shall be applied (1 = fully ... 0 = do not apply)

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.PartialApplyEffectRange``1(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Rectangle},System.Double)
member.summary: Applies the given bitmap effect to a given range/section of the given bitmap to a certain amount and interpolates the result with the input bitmap
member.param: Bitmap, to which the effect shall be (partially) applied
Region, in which the effect shall be applied (a null-value applies the effect to the entire bitmap)
Amount to which the effect shall be applied (1 = fully ... 0 = do not apply)

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.PartialApplyEffectRange``1(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Rectangle},System.Double,System.Object[])
member.param: Bitmap, to which the effect shall be (partially) applied
Region, in which the effect shall be applied (a null-value applies the effect to the entire bitmap)
Amount to which the effect shall be applied (1 = fully ... 0 = do not apply)

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.PartialApplyEffect(System.Drawing.Bitmap,SeeSharp.BitmapEffect,System.Double)
member.param: Bitmap, to which the effect shall be (partially) applied
Amount to which the effect shall be applied (1 = fully ... 0 = do not apply)

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.PartialApplyEffect``1(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Double)
member.param: Bitmap, to which the effect shall be (partially) applied

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.PartialApplyEffect``1(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Double,System.Object[])
member.param: Bitmap, to which the effect shall be (partially) applied

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.ApplyBlendEffect``1(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Applies the given bitmap blending effect to the two given bitmaps

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.ApplyBlendEffect``1(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Object[])
member.summary: Applies the given bitmap blending effect to the two given bitmaps

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.ApplyEffectRange(System.Drawing.Bitmap,SeeSharp.BitmapEffect,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Rectangle})
member.param: Region, in which the effect shall be applied (a null-value applies the effect to the entire bitmap)

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.ApplyBlendEffectRange(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Bitmap,SeeSharp.BitmapBlendEffect,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Rectangle})
member.summary: Applies the given bitmap blending effect to a given range/section of the two given bitmaps
member.param: Region, in which the effect shall be applied (a null-value applies the effect to the entire bitmap)

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.ApplyBlendEffectRange``1(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Rectangle})
member.summary: Applies the given bitmap blending effect to a given range/section of the two given bitmaps
member.param: Region, in which the effect shall be applied (a null-value applies the effect to the entire bitmap)

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.ApplyBlendEffectRange``1(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Rectangle},System.Object[])
member.summary: Applies the given parameterized bitmap blending effect to a given range/section of the two given bitmaps
member.param: Region, in which the effect shall be applied (a null-value applies the effect to the entire bitmap)

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.Average(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Double)
member.summary: Merges the given two bitmaps by averaging each pixel's color information (even the α-channel)

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.Merge(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Merges the given two bitmaps by averaging each pixel's color information (even the α-channel)

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.Merge(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Merges the given two bitmaps by interpolating each pixel's color information
member.param: Decides, whether the alpha-channel should also be interpolated
Decides, whether the pixel information shall be averaged instead of being added

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.Unlock(SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo)
member.summary: Unlocks the bitmap from the given lock information and returns it

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.LockBitmap(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Locks the given bitmap and returns the corresponding locking structure

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.ToARGB32(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Converts the given bitmap to an 32-Bit ARGB (alpha, red, green and blue) bitmap

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.RGBtoHSL(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Double@,System.Double@,System.Double@)
member.summary: Converts the given RGB-color to a HSL-color

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapEffectFunctions.HSLtoRGB(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Byte@,System.Byte@,System.Byte@)
member.summary: Converts the given HSL-color to a RGB-color

member.name: T:SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo
member.summary: Represents a dataset containing valuable information about a locked unmanaged bitmap

member.name: P:SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo.PXF
member.summary: The bitmap's pixel format

member.name: P:SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo.DAT
member.summary: The bitmap's internal data structure

member.name: P:SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo.BMP
member.summary: The (locked) bitmap

member.name: P:SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo.PTR
member.summary: A memory pointer pointing to the first of the bitmap's pixel

member.name: P:SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo.ARR
member.summary: A raw byte array containing all of the bitmap's color information

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo.Lock(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Locks the given bitmap and returns the corresponding locking structure

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo.Unlock
member.summary: Unlocks the underlying bitmap and returns it

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the current instance

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo.op_Implicit(SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo)~SeeSharp.Pixel*
member.summary: Converts the given bitmap locking structure to an unmanaged pixel pointer

member.name: M:SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo.op_Implicit(SeeSharp.BitmapLockInfo)~System.Byte*
member.summary: Converts the given bitmap locking structure to an unmanaged byte pointer

member.name: T:SeeSharp.Pixel
member.summary: Represents a native pixel 32-bit color information structure

member.name: F:SeeSharp.Pixel.B
member.summary: The pixel's blue channel

member.name: F:SeeSharp.Pixel.G
member.summary: The pixel's green channel

member.name: F:SeeSharp.Pixel.R
member.summary: The pixel's red channel

member.name: F:SeeSharp.Pixel.A
member.summary: The pixel's alpha channel

member.name: P:SeeSharp.Pixel.ARGB
member.summary: The color information stored in an 32-Bit signed integer value

member.name: P:SeeSharp.Pixel.ARGBu
member.summary: The color information stored in an 32-Bit unsigned integer value

member.name: P:SeeSharp.Pixel.Af
member.summary: The pixel's alpha channel represented as floating-point value in the interval of [0..1]

member.name: P:SeeSharp.Pixel.Rf
member.summary: The pixel's red channel represented as floating-point value in the interval of [0..1]

member.name: P:SeeSharp.Pixel.Gf
member.summary: The pixel's green channel represented as floating-point value in the interval of [0..1]

member.name: P:SeeSharp.Pixel.Bf
member.summary: The pixel's blue channel represented as floating-point value in the interval of [0..1]

member.name: P:SeeSharp.Pixel.Pointer
member.summary: An unmanaged structure pointer pointing to the current instance

member.name: P:SeeSharp.Pixel.BytePointer
member.summary: An unmanaged byte pointer pointing to the current instance

member.name: P:SeeSharp.Pixel.VoidPointer
member.summary: An unmanaged void pointer pointing to the current instance
